response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense worth to me, reflecting years of dedication and hard work. I am confident it can bring substantial value to you as well.

I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its true value while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. This offer is exclusive to you and is subject to your acceptance within the next 48 hours.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details or any questions you might have. I am more than happy to provide additional information about the product's capabilities, benefits, and how it can specifically meet your needs.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
